subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Gunners routed Everton, 6-1, to open their Premier League season, and a late goal by Didier Drogba gave Chelsea’s new manager, Carlo Ancelotti, a boost in his debut.
snippet: The Gunners routed Everton, 6-1, to open their Premier League season, and a late goal by Didier Drogba gave Chelsea’s new manager, Carlo Ancelotti, a boost in his debut.
